thread.title: Neville: Martial must respond to Mourinho challenge… these two Man United stars have done
thread.title_full: Neville: Martial must respond to Mourinho challenge… these two Man United stars have done

title: Neville: Martial must respond to Mourinho challenge… these two Man United stars have done
text:
1 of 11 Express Sport brings you 10 key statistics from Man United's win over Watford Martial has got to decide which way he wants to take it, as have a couple of others Gary Neville 
"With Mkhitaryan earlier in the season there was something wrong between him and the manager and he wasn't quite in favour, but he has come in and has looked outstanding," Neville told Sky Sports' Monday Night Football . 
"Martial has got to decide which way he wants to take it, as have a couple of others. 
"Chris Smalling has come back into the team having been criticised and done well. 
"Luke Shaw has got to determine how he wants to take it. 
"What Jose Mourinho has decided to do is challenge these players and say 'are you good enough to play for this club? Have you got what it takes to go out there and deliver week in and week out?' 
"Martial is a huge signing in terms of money and is still very young. However, he is a massive, massive potential talent. He could be anything he wants to be." Related articles
